subject: Economic Conditions and Trends
Baseball
Citi Field (NYC)
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Executives and Management
lead_paragraph: Belt-tightening on Wall Street could have severe consequences for the Mets and the Yankees, who expected bankers, brokers and fund managers to fill top seats.
snippet: Belt-tightening on Wall Street could have severe consequences for the Mets and the Yankees, who expected bankers, brokers and fund managers to fill top seats.
